fields.summary: [R] Implement bindings for lubridate component extraction functions

worklogs.comment:
AlenkaF opened a new pull request #12218:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12218


   Adding a binding for `lubridate::mday` in _expressions.R_ and a test for date and timestamp.
   
   Note: `day()` is an aliase for `mday()` in lubridate.


--
